text: Beauty attracts us men but if, like an armed magnet it is pointed, beside, with gold and silver, it attracts with tenfold power.
author: Jean Paul

text: So much has been said and sung of beautiful young girls, why doesn't somebody wake up to the beauty of old women.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

text: In LA, where I live, it's all about perfectionism. Beauty is now defined by your bones sticking out of your decolletage. For that to be the standard is really perilous for women.
author: Alanis Morissette

text: Beauty is now defined by your bones sticking out of your decolletage. For that to be the standard is really perilous for women.
author: Alanis Morissette

text: Beauty will be convulsive or will not be at all.
author: Andre Breton
